author: Press
title: Maryland Music Awards Returns
text:
(MENAFN Press) The second Maryland Music Awards kicked off its nominations process on June 17th with the hopes of finding some new talent and being able to acknowledge some of Maryland's great music. The first Maryland Music Awards was a huge success and was held at Maryland's Ramshead Live music venue last December 2nd. The event was not only to show case Maryland's great music scene but to raise funds to help children with cancer and their families though the Nicole Van Horn Foundation. Last years event had the "who's who" of Maryland music both on stage and in the audience. This year we've added a few new categories said the shows assistant producer Josh Scarf. "We've added Heavy Metal Blues and EDM".The nomination process will run until December 17th 2015 and the date and location of the actual awards show have not been determined as of yet. To follow all of the updates as they are released go to www.marylandmusicawards.org. For more information contact Josh Scarf at 410-628-7260 or email him at josh@sheffieldav.com
